free, happy, big, seeing more enjoying the world

to be truly free, you need to not be bogged down by anything
but to be happy, you need to make those human connections, you need to commit and sacrifice
so does being happy contradict being free.

the world is so infinitely big that you can never assume you can come close to seeing all of it
i guess even if you want to see the whole world
you have to realize that you're world is capped at 150.
when you gain, you lose something.

if time is finite and if you're not wasting time, do you see more by walking to more places?
